metadata.title: CVE-2024-37407 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Libarchive before 3.7.4 allows name out-of-bounds access when a ZIP archivehas an empty-name file and mac-ext is enabled. This occurs inslurp_central_directory in archive_read_support_format_zip.c.

criterions.comment: libarchive package in bionic is affected and needs fixing.
